statements: SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY expiration_date ASC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT patent_number, filing_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY filing_date DESC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT filing_date, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY filing_date ASC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC, expiration_date ASC
SELECT patent_number, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiration_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(patent_number) AS patent_count, YEAR(filing_date) AS filing_year FROM pharmaceutical_patents GROUP BY YEAR(filing_date)
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE filing_date < '2022-08-15' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents;
SELECT patent_number, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT filing_date, patent_number FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE filing_date < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM patent_owners WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Johnson%' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents JOIN patent_owners ON pharmaceutical_patents.patent_number = patent_owners.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents INNER JOIN patent_owners ON pharmaceutical_patents.patent_number = patent_owners.owner_id WHERE expiration_date > '2023-12-31';
SELECT patent_number, expiration_date FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE filing_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT owner_name FROM patent_owners WHERE owner_id IN (SELECT patent_number FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_patents WHERE expiration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2025-12-31' ORDER BY filing_date ASC;
SELECT owner_name, expiration_date FROM patent_owners INNER JOIN pharmaceutical_patents ON patent_owners.owner_id = pharmaceutical_patents.patent_number ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalPatents;
SELECT holder_id, holder_name FROM PatentHolders;
SELECT patent_number, expiration_date FROM PharmaceuticalPatents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT holder_name, assignment_date FROM PatentHolders JOIN PatentAssignments ON PatentHolders.holder_id = PatentAssignments.assignee_id;
SELECT * FROM PatentAssignments WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PharmaceuticalPatents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, filing_date ASC;
SELECT holder_name, expiration_date FROM PatentHolders JOIN PharmaceuticalPatents ON holder_id = patent_number WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT holder_name, COUNT(*) AS total_assignments FROM PatentHolders JOIN PatentAssignments ON holder_id = assignee_id GROUP BY holder_id ORDER BY total_assignments DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT holder_name FROM PatentHolders WHERE holder_id IN (SELECT assignee_id FROM PatentAssignments);

SELECT assignment_id, holder_name, filing_date FROM PatentHolders JOIN PatentAssignments ON holder_id = assignee_id JOIN PharmaceuticalPatents ON patent_id = patent_number ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT patent_number, filing_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT inventor_name FROM inventors WHERE LENGTH(inventor_name) > 10;
SELECT owner_name AS company_name FROM patent_owners;
SELECT * FROM patent_assignees JOIN patents ON patent_assignees.patent_id = patents.patent_id;
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT patent_id, patent_number FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT inventor_name, COUNT(patent_id) AS num_patents FROM inventors JOIN patent_assignees ON inventor_id = patent_id GROUP BY inventor_name;
SELECT owner_name, COUNT(*) AS num_assigned_patents FROM patent_assignees JOIN patent_owners ON owner_id = patent_id GROUP BY owner_name ORDER BY num_assigned_patents DESC;
SELECT owner_name, inventor_name FROM patent_owners JOIN patent_assignees ON owner_id = patent_id JOIN inventors ON inventor_id = inventor_id;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, patent_number, expiration_date FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, filing_date FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT patent_number, expiration_date FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patent_id, filing_date FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT owner_name FROM patent_owners WHERE patent_id = 1;
SELECT inventor_name, patent_number FROM inventors JOIN patents ON inventors.inventor_id = patents.patent_id;
SELECT DISTINCT category_name FROM patent_categories WHERE category_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_assignments WHERE assignee_name = 'Company A' AND patent_id IN (SELECT patent_id FROM patents WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31');
